description: Number of 2 X 2 singular integer matrices with elements from {0,...,n}.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[n_] := Table[{w, x, y, z} /. {ToRules[ Reduce[0 <= x <= n && 0 <= y <= n && 0 <= z <= n && w*z - x*y == 0, {x, y, z}, Integers]] }, {w, 0, n}] // Flatten[#, 1]& // Length; Table[Print[an = a[n]]; an, {n, 0, 42}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 11 2013 *)
author: _John W. Layman_, Jan 25 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jan 09 2003
